long_description: Weather-resistant polyester fabric with added stretch makes the Woolrich Vector jacket an easy choice for staying warm during cool-weather adventures on the trails. Lightweight, breathable polyester/spandex fabric blend feels soft against skin and stretches to allow full range of motion; Durable Water Repellent finish sheds light rain. Zippered hand pockets and zippered chest pocket. Woolrich Vector jacket features a drawcord-adjustable hem to seal in warmth. Closeout.
short_description: Weather-resistant polyester fabric with added stretch makes the Woolrich Vector jacket an easy choice for staying warm during cool-weather adventures on the trails.
